Hello!

I’m **Kostadin Kostadinov** – a medical doctor, assistant professor and researcher in the department of Social Medicine and Public Health, Plovdiv, Bulgaria. My background is in internal medicine, epidemiology, health policy and economics. I am interested in data science, policy evaluation, and health services research.
